# Installation & Setup

## ğŸš€ Quick Install (Recommended)

### Step 1: Install the CLI

```bash
cd xano-lsp-cli
npm install
npm link
```

This makes two commands globally available:
- `xs-lint` - Validate XanoScript files
- `xs-setup` - Install Claude Code integration

### Step 2: Setup Claude Code Integration

```bash
# Go to your XanoScript project
cd /path/to/your/xanoscript-project

# Run automatic setup
xs-setup
```

### Step 3: Start Coding!

Open your project in Claude Code and:
- **Automatic validation**: Edit any `.xs` file â†’ automatic validation
- **Manual validation**: Type `/xs-lint` â†’ on-demand validation
- **CLI validation**: Run `xs-lint` in terminal

## ğŸ¯ What You Get

After running `xs-setup`, you get THREE ways to validate:

### 1. Automatic (Skill)
```
You: "Create an endpoint for users"
Claude: Creates file + auto-validates + reports status
```

### 2. Manual Command (Slash Command)
```
You: /xs-lint
Claude: Runs validation on all .xs files
```

### 3. CLI (Terminal)
```bash
$ xs-lint
âœ… No issues found!
```

## ğŸ“¦ Installation Options

### Option A: Local Project Setup

```bash
cd your-xanoscript-project
xs-setup
```

Installs skill & command to `.claude/` in current project only.

### Option B: Global Setup (All Projects)

```bash
xs-setup --global
```

Installs to `~/.claude/` - available in ALL projects automatically!

### Option C: Symlink Setup (Auto-Updates)

```bash
xs-setup --symlink
```

Creates links instead of copies - gets updates when CLI updates.

### Option D: Selective Install

```bash
# Only automatic validation
xs-setup --skill

# Only manual command
xs-setup --command
```

## ğŸ”„ Updating

To update the CLI and integration:

```bash
# Update CLI
cd xano-lsp-cli
git pull
npm install

# If you used --symlink, you're done! (auto-updates)
# If you copied files, re-run setup:
cd your-xanoscript-project
xs-setup
```

## ğŸ—‘ï¸ Uninstalling

### Remove Claude Code Integration

```bash
# From project
rm -rf .claude/skills/xanoscript-lint
rm .claude/commands/xs-lint.md

# Or from global
rm -rf ~/.claude/skills/xanoscript-lint
rm ~/.claude/commands/xs-lint.md
```

### Remove CLI

```bash
npm unlink xanoscript-lint
```

## âœ… Verify Installation

```bash
# Check CLI is installed
xs-lint --version
xs-setup --help

# Check Claude Code integration
ls .claude/skills/xanoscript-lint/
ls .claude/commands/xs-lint.md

# Test validation
xs-lint test/example.xs
```

## ğŸ› Troubleshooting

### "command not found: xs-setup"

You need to link the CLI first:
```bash
cd xano-lsp-cli
npm link
```

### Claude Code not finding skill/command

1. Check files exist: `ls .claude/`
2. Restart Claude Code
3. Re-run: `xs-setup`

### Validation not working

Check XanoScript VS Code extension is installed:
```bash
code --list-extensions | grep xano
```

Should show: `xano.xanoscript@x.x.x`
